item.description:
Our 4th annual Pizza Party will take place, as usual, at NEBO ( http://neborestaurant.com/) if you get there between 6:00-7:00, join us for a drink. I'll place the order for pizzas at 6:30 and most of them should be ready shortly after 7:00. We'll have different pizzas including Scampi, Prosciutto e fichi, Napoletana and Margherita. (Check their menu for the ingredients of each.

 (http://www.neborestaurant.com/assets/menus/nebo_restaurant_menu.pdf)

When you get there, please check in with me so that I may check off your name and collect $6 for the pizza. (Your on your own with drinks.) We'll have an area just inside the front windows to sit, stand, mingle or whatever you prefer for the evening. Afterward, as is our tradition, we'll head to Caffe Vittoria for coffees and desserts.

NEBO is located at 90 North Washington St. just around the corner from Causeway St. If you come from North Station, walk toward the North End and take a right on N.Washington just before the bridge. This is our best event each year for meeting new and old members. So please try to join us.

IMPORTANT: Please access our 'Pages' tab for further event guidelines.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the front of the restaurant.
item.name: NEBO-4th Annual Pizza Party
